email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a client looking to move 100,000 MT of crude oil from Rotterdam to Singapore. The laycan is 15-20 October. Could you provide a freight quote for this? Looking forward to your response. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for reaching out. For 100,000 MT of crude oil from Rotterdam to Singapore, we can offer a rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per MT. The vessel 'Ocean Voyager' is available, with a DWT of 120,000 and LOA of 250 meters. Let me know if this works for your client. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for the quick response. My client is considering the offer but is hoping for a rate closer to $50.00 per MT. Also, could you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, I understand your client's position. We can adjust the rate to $50.25 per MT, but that's our best offer. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for the flexibility. My client has agreed to the rate of $50.25 per MT and the laytime/demurrage terms. Please confirm the laycan of 15-20 October and proceed with the booking. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, excellent news. The laycan of 15-20 October is confirmed, and the vessel 'Ocean Voyager' is booked for your client. I'll send over the charter party shortly. Thanks for the smooth negotiation! Best, John
